summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to accept offer made by the Rainier Valley State Bank, Fremont State Bank, Ballard Branch Union Savings and Trust Company, Georgetown Branch Union Savings and Trust Company, University State Bank, Green Lake State Bank, Citizens Bank of Georgetown, and the Scandinavian- American Bank Ballard, to collect for the City of Seattle light and water bills free of charge to the payers for a period of 1 year.
